Texts.Chs: 太阳能发电板可以生成电力，而这正是其他用电设备所需要的。接下来，请制作一个^orange;电池组 I^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Other options for power include Solar, Combustion, Fission and Quantum power generation. Each has pros and cons. You'll definitely want to try them each.

Texts.Chs: 恭喜，你制造出了^orange;电子设备制造机^reset;！你^green;终于^reset;可以做出某些更高级的设备了。快做一个^orange;交流发电机^reset;吧！
Texts.Eng: You can generate power in many ways. Alternator generators are just the simplest. Try building a ^orange;Wind Turbine^reset;, and see how useful they get in a windstorm!
